data.question: What is the empirical formula of the compound that yields a purple microcrystalline solid upon rapid mixing of methanolic solutions?
What is the crystal system of the compound [Mn(TCNQ-TCNQ)(MeOH)2·2MeOH]∞?
What is the color of the microcrystalline product formed when [M(CH3CN)6][BF4]2 reacts with 2 equiv of [nBu4N][TCNQ] in CH3CN?
Does the compound [Mn(TCNQ)(TCNQ-TCNQ)0.5(MeOH)2]∞ exhibit Curie-Weiss behavior?
Is the magnetic moment (μeff) of [Mn(TCNQ-TCNQ)(MeOH)2·2MeOH]∞ higher than that of [Mn(TCNQ)(TCNQ-TCNQ)0.5(MeOH)2]∞?
What is the space group of the compound [Mn(TCNQ)(TCNQ-TCNQ)0.5(MeOH)2]∞?
What type of magnetic behavior does [Mn(TCNQ-TCNQ)(MeOH)2·2MeOH]∞ exhibit between 5 and 300 K?
Is the compound [Mn(TCNQ-TCNQ)(MeOH)2·2MeOH]∞ diamagnetic?
What is the role of MeOH in the synthesis of Mn(TCNQ)2(MeOH)2?
Does the presence of MeOH lead to the formation of different products in the reaction between [Mn(MeCN)4][BF4]2 and [nBu4N][TCNQ]?
What is the effect of slow diffusion of reactants in a MeOH/MeCN mixture on the product formation?
data.answer: Formation of purple monoclinic needles of [Mn(TCNQ)(TCNQ−TCNQ)0.5(MeOH)2]∞

data.question: Is the compound [Mn(TCNQ)(TCNQ−TCNQ)0.5(MeOH)2]∞ composed of a 2-D network of Mn(II) ions?
What is the coordination environment of Mn(II) in [Mn(TCNQ−TCNQ)(MeOH)2·MeOH]∞?
What is the significance of the X-ray structures of [Mn(TCNQ-TCNQ)(MeOH)2·2MeOH]∞ and [Mn(TCNQ)(TCNQ−TCNQ)0.5(MeOH)2]∞?
data.answer: They are among the few crystallographically determined binary materials of TCNQ

data.question: Does the IR spectrum of [Mn(TCNQ-TCNQ)(MeOH)2·2MeOH]∞ exhibit a δ(C-H) mode at 806 cm-1?
What does the presence of a δ(C-H) mode at 825 cm-1 in the IR spectrum indicate?
Is the magnetic moment of [Mn(TCNQ)(TCNQ−TCNQ)0.5(MeOH)2]∞ approximately 6.9 BM?
What is the role of σ-dimerized [TCNQ]−• in [Mn(TCNQ)(TCNQ−TCNQ)0.5(MeOH)2]∞?
What is the crystal system of [Mn(TCNQ)(TCNQ−TCNQ)0.5(MeOH)2]∞?
Does the compound [Mn(TCNQ-TCNQ)(MeOH)2·2MeOH]∞ have a higher magnetic moment than [Mn(TCNQ)(TCNQ−TCNQ)0.5(MeOH)2]∞?
